messages.msgSnippet: Hi Robin, ps system has thier own ideas I guess, as I do mine. Which includes my right to teach my children what and how I please! They seem happier for the
messages.messageBody:
Hi Robin, ps system has thier own ideas I guess, as I do mine. Which
includes my right to teach my children what and how I please! They seem
happier for the change and we are too! Tami

>school just this year because I was tired of fighting
>with them about what they were teaching my Cherokee
>boy about Indian people. And also my son is not a
>desk robot.
>
>The difficulty I am having is trying to do everything!
> I work full time (60 hrs a week), make time for my
>son, and part of taking care of me is a horse that Im
>training.
>
>Id like to chat with other working moms out there. :)
>
>Robin

messages.subject: Another New Member
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I am new also.  I am mom to an ADHD, gifted 10yb.  We are Cherokee.  I pulled my son from public school just this year because I was tired of fighting
messages.messageBody:
Hello, I am new also. I am mom to an ADHD, gifted
10yb. We are Cherokee. I pulled my son from public
school just this year because I was tired of fighting
with them about what they were teaching my Cherokee
boy about Indian people. And also my son is not a
desk robot.

The difficulty I am having is trying to do everything!
I work full time (60 hrs a week), make time for my
son, and part of taking care of me is a horse that Im
training.

Id like to chat with other working moms out there. :)

Robin
